docs.title: About Me
docs.text:
Hi Everyone! My name is Alfonso Antonio — but you can call me “AA”.

I'm 25 years old and currently based in Manila, Philippines .

I recently graduated last 2024 on FEU Alabang 🔰 with a degree of Computer Engineering.

I worked as an SRE Associate at OpsWerks, serving mostly as an L1 on-call engineer for a Fortune 500 company specializing in payment systems. ⚙️💳 My responsibilities included monitoring system health, responding to service alerts, performing initial incident triage, internal and external partner communication, deployment management, and ensuring platform reliability during production issues. 👨‍💻

I’m passionate about fitness 💪, curious about cloud engineering ☁️, and I enjoy experimenting with Kubernetes, coding projects, and anything tech. Outside of that, I love exploring new ideas, improving my skills, hanging out with my friends 🥂, grabbing coffee ☕, exploring my city 🏢, and building things just for fun.

Work In-progress 👷

docs.title: SRE Associate — OpsWerks
docs.text:
L1 On-Call Engineer for a Fortune 500 Payment Systems Company ⚙️💳

  • Monitored production environments and system health in real time
  • Performed initial triage during incidents and escalated when needed
  • Investigated alerts, logs, and anomalies
  • Helped ensure uptime, reliability, and service continuity across platforms

Work In-progress 👷
